Name: Percentage of cases where Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER occurs out of all completed reimbursement cases
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Frequency of Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER in variants that eventually lead to Payment Handled
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Percentage of Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER that is immediately followed by Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Number of times Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER appears in process variants containing Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' occurs

Name: Percentage of variants containing Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER that result in a successful Payment Handled without prior rejections
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Number of Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER events that occur after Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION
Metric: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' occurs

Name: Percentage of Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER that is part of a variant with more than one approval step before final supervisor approval
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Frequency of Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER in cases with claim amounts above 100 euros
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all cases

Name: Ratio of variants containing Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER to variants that bypass it and go directly from Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION to Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Number of times Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER appears in variants that also contain Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER at any point
Metric: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' occurs

Name: Percentage of total activity executions in the log that correspond to Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER that leads directly to Request Payment without intermediate rejections
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all 'Request Payment'

Name: Number of variants where Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER occurs but Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER never occurs
Metric: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' does not occur

Name: Percentage of cases with Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER that belong to the top three most frequent successful variants
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Ratio of the frequency of Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER to the frequency of Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Percentage of Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER executions that are part of a case ultimately resulting in Payment Handled
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Percentage of Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER occurrences relative to the total number of approval activities (including Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION, Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER, and Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER in variants that do not include any rejection activity
Metric: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' activities

Name: Percentage of Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER that is not preceded by any rejection activity (e.g., Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION, Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER, etc.)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all cases
